note: Twitter refugee. Liberal boomer, atheist, married, she/her, Oregon. I love the birds in my yard. I love cats, too, but please build them a catio or keep them indoors.  Owner of a Great Pyr Mix.  I have a Certified Backyard Habitat in my yard. (Deleted all my posts once, so started over. Doing my best not to share too many personal stories on such a public forum).
